    • Method Detail

      • getVersionableNode

        public static javax.jcr.Node getVersionableNode(javax.jcr.Node handleNode)
                                         throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Returns the versionable node (which is the same as preview variant node in case of hippo document handle). If handleNode is not a hippo:handle or a mix:versionable, then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        handleNode - document handle node
        Returns:
        the versionable document variant node (which is the same as preview variant node)
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if unexpected repository exception occurs

      • getRootVersion

        public static javax.jcr.version.Version getRootVersion(javax.jcr.Node versionableNode,
                                                       List<javax.jcr.version.Version> linearVersions)
                                                throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Finds the root version of the versionableNode from the given linearVersions.
        Parameters:
        versionableNode - versionable node (type of mix:versionable)
        linearVersions - linear versions list
        Returns:
        the root version of the versionableNode
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if unexpected repository exception occurs

      • getVersionAsOf

        public static javax.jcr.version.Version getVersionAsOf(javax.jcr.Node versionableNode,
                                                       List<javax.jcr.version.Version> linearVersions,
                                                       Calendar asOf)
                                                throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Finds the latest version of the versionableNode as of asOf datetime from the given linearVersions. If asOf is null, then returns the latest version.
        Parameters:
        versionableNode - versionable node (type of mix:versionable)
        linearVersions - linear versions list
        asOf - asOf datetime
        Returns:
        the latest version of the versionableNode as of asOf datetime If asOf is null, then returns the latest version.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if unexpected repository exception occurs

      • getAllLinearVersions

        public static List<javax.jcr.version.Version> getAllLinearVersions(javax.jcr.Node versionableNode)
                                                            throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Finds all ordered linear versions of the versionableNode.
        Parameters:
        versionableNode - versionable node (type of mix:versionable).
        Returns:
        list of Version instances
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if unexpected repository exception occurs

      • hasLiveFrozenNode

        public static boolean hasLiveFrozenNode(javax.jcr.version.Version version)
                                 throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Returns true if the version has a frozen node which is the content of the "live" unpublished document.
        Parameters:
        version - version
        Returns:
        true if the version has a frozen node which is the content of the "live" unpublished document
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if unexpected repository exception occurs
